formName: Application for Authorised Economic Operator (Section 5  C118-questionnaire)

fields.label: Member states country codes
fields.infoText:
Find the required [member state country codes](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/uk-trade-tariff-country-and-currency-codes/uk-trade-tariff-country-and-currency-codes#a "Member state country codes") here 

 You will need to press back in your browser to get back to this form

fields.label: Your trader identification number is the same as your Economic Operator Registration and Identification (EORI) number
EORI number
fields.helpText: Enter your country code followed by your 12 digit reference, for example GB123456789123

sections.title: 5.1.1: Practical standards of competence or professional qualifications
sections.description: Guidance for this section can be found at (Article 39 (d) UCC, Article 27 UCC IA, AEO Guidelines Part 2 Section IV)

fields.label: Do you or the person in charge of your customs matters have practical experience of a minimum of 3 years in customs matters?
fields.shortName: Experienced person in charge of customs matters

sections.title: Person in charge of customs matters
sections.shortName: Person in charge of customs matters

fields.label: Provide details proving the person in charge of customs matters has a minumum of 3 years practical experience in customs matters

sections.title: 5.1.2: Practical standards of competence - quality standard
sections.shortName: 5.1.2: Practical standards of competence - quality standard

fields.label: Do you or the person in charge of your customs matters comply with a quality standard concerning customs matters adopted by a European Standardisation body, when available?
fields.shortName: Experienced person in charge of customs matters

fields.label: Provide details on this quality standard.

fields.infoText: Have you or the person in charge of your customs matters successfully completed training covering customs legislation consistent with, and relevant to, the extent of your involvement in customs-related activities, provided by any of the following:

fields.label: A customs authority of a Member State
fields.shortName: Training provided by a customs authority of a member state

fields.label: An educational establishment recognised, for the purposes of providing such qualification, by the customs authorities or a body of a Member State responsible for professional training
fields.shortName: Training provided by a recognised educational establishment

fields.label: A professional or trade association recognised by the customs authorities of a Member State or accredited in the Union, for the purposes of providing such qualification?
fields.shortName: Training provided by a professional or trade association

fields.label: provide details regarding the training, provided by a customs authority of a member state, you or the person in charge of your customs matters have successfully completed.
provide details regarding the training, provided by an educational establishment , you or the person in charge of your customs matters have successfully completed.
provide details regarding the training, provided by a professional or trade association , you or the person in charge of your customs matters have successfully completed.

sections.title: Have you completed all the forms for your application?

fields.infoText:
You need to send all relevant forms within a 24 hour period, or your application will be rejected.

If you are not ready to send all your forms within this period, you need to save and come back later.

fields.label: What do I need to complete?
fields.infoText:
If you are applying for AEO status customs simplification (AEOC) you need to complete the following forms:

C117

C118-1-1

C118-1-2

C118-1-3

C118-2

C118-3-1

C118-3-2

C118-4

C118-5


If you are applying for AEO status security and safety (AEOS) you need to complete the following forms:

C117

C118-1-1

C118-1-2

C118-1-3

C118-2

C118-3-1

C118-3-2

C118-4

C118-6-1

C118-6-2

C118-6-3

C118-6-4


If you are applying for both you need to complete the following forms:

C117

C118-1-1

C118-1-2

C118-1-3

C118-2

C118-3-1

C118-3-2

C118-4

C118-5

C118-6-1

C118-6-2

C118-6-3

C118-6-4

fields.label: Provide details below of who is signing the declaration
Job title
fields.helpText: For example, director, financial controller or secretary

fields.label: Email address
fields.helpText: We will send an email to this address to confirm weâ€™ve received this form

fields.infoText: By sending this form, you declare that the information you have provided is true and complete.
This is your last opportunity to print or save a PDF copy of your submitted form.

You need to send us all of the relevant forms within **24 hours**.

If you do not send us these details in time, you will need to start a new application.

If you have sent us all the relevant details, we will tell you within 60 calendar days if your application has been successful.

If your application is unsuccessful we will tell you why.

**If you need help**

[Check the guidance](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/authorised-economic-operator-certification) to find out: 
- what you need to do while we process your application
- how to make changes to your application
- how to contact HMRC about your application
